TC_3.1.description: Validate that user successfully view own cart when there is no any item in cart
TC_3.1.author: Anoja

TC_3.2.description: Validate that user successfully views their cart when there are items in the cart
TC_3.2.author: Anoja

TC_3.3.description: Validate that user added all products are displayed in cart page
TC_3.3.author: Anoja

TC_3.4.description: Validate that Checkout button is available and user directs to checkout step one page after clicked on checkout button
TC_3.4.author: Anoja

TC_3.5.description: Validate that user can continue shopping by click on Continue Shopping button on cart page
TC_3.5.author: Anoja

TC_3.6.description: Validate that Checkout button is available and user directs to checkout step one page after clicked on checkout button without cart items
TC_3.6.author: Anoja
